name: Lawful Neutral
tagline: You act as law, tradition, or personal code direct you. Order and organization are paramount.
description: A lawful neutral character acts as law, tradition, or a personal code directs her. Order and organization are paramount. She may believe in personal order and live by a code or standard, or she may believe in order for all and favor a strong, organized government.
Lawful neutral means you are reliable and honorable without being a zealot.
